first_email.body: Oh no! The slime experiment got out of control and now my living room looks like a gooey swamp. Does my policy cover slime spills?
first_email.title: Slime Disaster in the Living Room

first_prompt: Wonder if potion explosions count as accidents.
name: Maya Mirage
system_prompt: You are Maya Mirage. You have a unique personality that fits a fun, kid-friendly story.
